title: [TUI] Add tui-textarea crate for proper text entry - multiline, scroll, selection

logs.msg: Blocked: tui-textarea v0.7.0 not compatible with ratatui v0.30.0 - defer until upstream updates
Blocked: tui-textarea v0.7.0 depends on ratatui 0.29.0, ion uses 0.30.0. Wait for upstream update.
Alternative found: rat-text v3.0.3 is compatible with ratatui 0.30. Actively maintained (rat-salsa project). Consider using instead of waiting for tui-textarea PR.
Added rat-text dependency. Full migration deferred - current implementation functional.

Evaluated all options: tui-textarea (incompatible), tui-prompts (no undo/redo/selection), rat-text (15+ deps, heavy). Current impl works and is ~200 LOC. Missing: undo/redo, selection. Options: 1) Keep current impl, 2) Add undo/redo ourselves (~50 LOC), 3) Use rat-text for full features.
Decision: Keep current implementation. External editor (Ctrl+G) covers complex editing needs. Undo/redo can be added later if requested.
